meanings.definition: Relating to or along a tangent.
meanings.sent1: The tangental line touched the circle at just one point.
meanings.sent2: Her comment was tangental to the main discussion.
meanings.sent3: The tangental idea of having a picnic in the office made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were tangental to reality, floating in a world of imagination.
meanings.sent5: The tangental relationship between the two characters added depth to the story.

meanings.definition: Diverging from a main topic or course.
meanings.sent1: The speaker went off on a tangental story about his childhood.
meanings.sent2: Her tangental remarks made it hard to follow her presentation.
meanings.sent3: The tangental joke he made lightened the mood in the room.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship took a tangental turn after the argument.
meanings.sent5: The tangental plot twist in the movie surprised everyone.
